<p>
**Type:** `undefined`

**Default:** `true`
<Since v="2.0.0" />
</p>

Astro uses [GitHub-flavored Markdown](https://github.com/remarkjs/remark-gfm) by default. To disable this, set the `gfm` flag to `false`:

```js
{
  markdown: {
    gfm: false,
  }
}
```
